attributes.action: Bring back capital punishment for sex offenders and murderers
attributes.additional_details: With the technology we have more often than not offenders can be caught. We need to start cleansing our country of these people not letting them live a life of luxury in jail while the victims family suffer & use the money saved to really help these families. I want the Government to show they care about our country by really putting the victims first & the criminals last. Please sign this petition to make our country peaceful & safe place to live.
